{"id":941650395,"question_id":2765,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1682783866,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/941650395/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make Array Empty","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public long countOperationsToEmptyArray(int[] nums) {\n        long res = 0;\n        int len = nums.length;\n        TreeMap<Integer, Integer> map = new TreeMap<>();\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            map.put(nums[i], i);\n            \n        }\n        int del = 0;\n        int offset = 0;\n        for(Map.Entry<Integer, Integer> en : map.entrySet()){\n            \n            int val = en.getKey();\n            int idx = en.getValue();\n            // System.out.print(\"v=\"+val + \" idx=\" + idx + \" o=\" + offset + \" del=\"+del);\n            \n            if(idx-offset-del<0){\n                 idx += (len-offset-del-del+1) ;\n                \n                while(idx<0)\n                    idx+= (len-del);\n            }\n               \n            else\n                idx = idx-offset-del;\n            \n              // System.out.println( \" idx=\" + idx);\n            \n            res += idx;\n            del++;\n            offset += idx;\n            res+=1;\n            // len--;\n                \n            \n            \n            \n        }\n        \n        return res;\n        \n        // 3 4 -1\n        \n        // -1, 2\n        // 3, 0,\n        // 4, 1\n        \n        // res += 3, offset = 2\n        // 0 += (3-2)\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-array-empty","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
